website_summaries.verdict: The Vibram FiveFingers Alitza Loop delighted many of its users with its style and durability. Compared with other FiveFingers models, it was said to be easier to put on. Fitness aficionados commended the footwear for being able to keep up with strenuous activities.
pros: A majority of users claimed that the Vibram FiveFingers Alitza Loop was comfortable for long periods of use
The feminine style and color options of the trainer pleased a lot of reviewers
A good number of training enthusiasts liked the grippy outsole as it worked well during yoga, barre exercises, cross-training, and other high-intensity workouts
Several owners lauded the durability of this minimalist shoe
The shoe was easy to put on, according to a handful of people
Some consumers valued its lightweight nature
The fit was deemed satisfactory by a few testers
A couple of individuals raved about the breathable upper material
cons: Some purchasers doubted the durability of the loop structure
The intricate design on the top felt loose for a few commenters
A couple of gym-goers ranted that it lacked lateral support

customer_reviews.title: The best footwear I've bought this year. 10/10
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Vibram five finger shoe for my wife as she wanted them for yoga. She loves them and wear them all the time. She's normally size 6 however decided to order a 6.5 and there a perfect fit. Hi, I'm the wife. Lol ...I would recommend them to anyone but it takes about a week to get use to wearing them plus there the best thing I've worn.. I have bunions but it's not a problem. I'm now looking for a cheaper pair to wear instead of slippers. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: Struggling...update at the bottom of the review.
customer_reviews.text: I've taken onboard the manufacturers comments about trying to get used to these shoes but I think I will be sending back. It is very difficult to manipulate the smaller toes into the compartments and I have abandoned them twice now in favour of the usual trainers for the gym. The issue is that they are not really that flexible in the toe compartments and so it's really difficult to work them into the slots. I will give it one more try before returning but at this moment I can't say I'm overwhelmed with them. Update: I tried again as I said but I have to return them, they are just not for me. Perhaps my toes are too fat?
customer_reviews.author: Isola B

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love these unfortunately they came up a bit smaller than expected I brought 5.5 - 6 being a size 6. Would advise buying a 6 - 6.5 as my feet swell in summer. I am wearing them and intend using these for winter and buying the next size up so will let you know when those come through. By the way I suffer from ingrowing toe nails and these have created less irritation as my toes are kept away from each other. Bit hard the first time you put them on as it feels unnatural to separate the toes but been wearing them a few days at work and on outside walks and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: UK sizes are wrong! Too Small!
customer_reviews.text: Warning on the sizing: I purchased UK5.5-6 and these are an EU 37 which is a size 4.. box and shoes are similarly wrongly labelled. Returning for bigger size. I would say that they are a great shoe. Liked the design with the straps to hold the shoe in place. Very disappointing as I'm a repeat customer of Vibrams Five Fingers for over 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: David A Clark

customer_reviews.title: I loved them but unfortunately had to return them as they ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved them but unfortunately had to return them as they were way too small. I ordered what I thought was a UK size 5.5 - 6 but when they came it said EU 37 which is actually a UK 4 (& more likely the true size). I would have loved to get them in a bigger size but they almost doubled in price the day after I ordered them...gutted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I am more than pleased, they fit pretty well in spite of my feet being very oddly shaped. The barefoot feeling is amazing. The sole is extremely smart, it somehow drives the foot into plunging on the foot ball. In less words, these shoes are well over my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price too
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. My osecond pair of Vibrams and I will buy more.I have a selection of issues with my feet and these really help having my toes separated for dance and walking. Excellent price too.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if real
customer_reviews.text: Sent back as Not sure if these are real box looks ok but shoes different size not packed like real five toes.
customer_reviews.author: Empress

customer_reviews.title: SIZE TRIALS
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn these because they came too small but i know that if i can get the right size i will be delighted cos i know people who swear by them. Particular problem with the little toe; mine must be quite big. Friend who has got them said they don't stretch. So I am trying a whole size bigger so will keep you posted on the replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie-Jo C.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes - they are very slightly larger than ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes - they are very slightly larger than other Vibrams I have in a 41, but they fit fine and I really do like the style.
customer_reviews.author: LadyGodiva

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, Not to difficult to put on either ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy , Not to difficult to put on either..
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Shoes as a product are great, fits perfectly but about the seller
customer_reviews.text: Shoes as a product are great, fits perfectly but about the seller , I haven't seen any information about the price not including tax!!! What a surprise to find out an extra £10 charge on bank account, disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: wioleta wiktorko

customer_reviews.title: Lousy return policy + shoes too small
customer_reviews.text: Extremely unhappy. The shoes were much thinner than anticipated, so I initiated a return immediately and I brought the shoes to the return place on 13 July. 2 weeks have already passed and my profile hasn’t been updated that you have received the shoes. I hope someone will get in touch with me to give me an update.
customer_reviews.author: Plamena Todorova

customer_reviews.title: This shoes fitted comfortably for my size 8/42 feet and go through the ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoes fitted comfortably for my size 8/42 feet and go through the washing machine on a cool cycle without a problem. I've walked miles in them.
customer_reviews.author: Claire B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Perfect fit and looking forward to trying these out for squats
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Love these. So comfortable and feel great in. Bought these to use on my water rower machine, feels great to go running in as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: ... to get on at first but I do have funny feet but they are great for my body balance
customer_reviews.text: Tricky to get on at first but I do have funny feet but they are great for my body balance class
customer_reviews.author: Alyson MoulesAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: U. K. Size is completely different from US ...
customer_reviews.text: U.K. Size is completely different from US and European sizes noted on th product. If you purchase based on UK size, they will be very small
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Slightly too long and so tight I couldn't get them on at all. For what it's worth I'm usually a size 5e in Clarks and I bought the 5-5.5 in this shoe. I couldn't get my foot in at all Looks well made but I think not good for a deep or wide foot
customer_reviews.author: c

product_meta.title: Vibram FiveFingers Women's Alitza Loop Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description: An ideal minimalist shoe for fitness classes, barre and studio sessions, the Alitza Loop is light, breathable and follows your every move
feature_bullets: Polyester mesh upper with PU printing reinforcement
